abstract: Bank of America’s board should show its chief executive the door, and opinion on the Dow Chemical’s acquisition of Rohm and Haas.
snippet: Bank of America’s board should show its chief executive the door, and opinion on the Dow Chemical’s acquisition of Rohm and Haas.

abstract: Dow Chemical doesn’t want to close its $19 billion acquisition of Rohm and Haas — at least not yet.
lead_paragraph: Dow Chemical doesn’t want to close its $19 billion acquisition of Rohm and Haas — at least not yet.

headline.main: Rohm & Haas Is No Buyout Victim

abstract: Some of Wall Street’s anxiety eased after companies including United States Steel and American Express managed to post profits in a difficult recession.
snippet: Some of Wall Street’s anxiety eased after companies including United States Steel and American Express managed to post profits in a difficult recession.
lead_paragraph: Stock markets advanced for another day on Tuesday, making small gains as investors weighed a mixed bag of earnings reports against new evidence that housing prices were falling and consumers were becoming more pessimistic.

headline.main: Shares Close Higher for a Second Day
headline.print_headline: Shares Rise as Some Companies Surpass Profit Estimates

abstract: Dow Chemical‘s chief executive told CNBC on Tuesday that the chemical giant is very sorry that it can’t close its $15 billion merger with Rohm & Haas right away. Furthermore, it understands why Rohm has now slapped it with a lawsuit in Delaware’s Court of Chancery, which would seek to force completion of the deal.
lead_paragraph: Dow Chemical‘s chief executive told CNBC on Tuesday that the chemical giant is very sorry that it can’t close its $15 billion merger with Rohm & Haas right away. Furthermore, it understands why Rohm has now slapped it with a lawsuit in Delaware’s Court of Chancery, which would seek to force completion of the deal.

headline.main: Dow’s Chief Says Rohm Deal Is Still On

abstract: Watching Dow Chemical‘s chief executive, Andrew Liveris, on CNBC Tuesday morning, I felt as if I were watching some sort of mockumentary. (Watch the interview here.)
lead_paragraph: Watching Dow Chemical‘s chief executive, Andrew Liveris, on CNBC Tuesday morning, I felt as if I were watching some sort of mockumentary. (Watch the interview here.)
